name: tm46
effect: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Psywave)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
